mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_PW, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_TEL, MEMBER_BIRTHDAY, HEIGHT, WEIGHT, TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일" HH24"시" MI"분" SS"초"') ENROLL_DATE FROM "MEMBER" WHERE MEMBER_EMAIL = #{memberEmail} AND MEMBER_DEL_FL = 'N'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO "MEMBER" VALUES( SEQ_MEMBER_NO.NEXTVAL, #{memberEmail}, #{memberPw}, #{memberNickname}, #{memberTel}, #{memberAddress} , NULL, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT)

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "MEMBER" WHERE MEMBER_TEL = #{tel} AND MEMBER_DEL_FL = 'N'

SELECT ORDER_NO, ORDER_CLASS_NO, BOARD_NO, TITLE, DETAIL, TRAINER_NICKNAME, BOARD_TYPE_NAME FROM "ORDER" JOIN BOARD ON (ORDER_CLASS_NO = BOARD_NO) JOIN TRAINER ON (BOARD.TRAINER_NO = TRAINER.TRAINER_NO) JOIN BOARD_TYPE ON (BOARD.CLASS_NO = BOARD_TYPE.BOARD_TYPE_NO) WHERE ORDER_MEMBER_NO = #{orderMemberNo} ORDER BY ORDER_NO DESC
